subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Plawecki, replacing the injured catcher Travis d’Arnaud, went 2 for 4 and scored two runs as the Mets won their ninth straight, routing the Braves to improve to 11-3.
snippet: Kevin Plawecki, replacing the injured catcher Travis d’Arnaud, went 2 for 4 and scored two runs as the Mets won their ninth straight, routing the Braves to improve to 11-3.
